p: Further studies indicated that the civets may have been infected by bats. In 2017, the teams of Shi Zheng-Li and Cui Jie at the Wuhan Institute of Virology, China, discovered a mixed population of several species of horseshoe bats in a cave in the Yunnan province carrying a coronavirus variant with precisely the same genetic elements that were found in the pathogen of the SARS outbreak (PLoS Pathog. (2017) 13, e1006698).
